text.searchPlaceholder: Search by job title or description
text.noJobs: It seems like there are no positions available at the moment. How about you come back later?

about.title: About TJM
text: The Job Market is a platform that connects EU job seekers with employers. We aim to make the job search process as easy as possible. We believe that everyone should have access to the best opportunities out there. That's why we're here to help you find your dream job.

contact.title: Contact us
text: If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact us at
